content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator at Position (x=22.5, y=-7.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Steam Engine at position (x=22.5, y=-7.5)
- Boiler at position (x=20.5, y=-4.0)
- Offshore Pump at position (x=19.5, y=-1.5)
- PipeGroup connecting these entities with various pipes at positions such as (x=20.5, y=-10.5), (x=21.5, y=-10.5), (x=22.5, y=-10.5), etc.
- Small Electric Poles at positions such as (x=24.5, y=-6.5), (x=24.5, y=-7.5), and (x=22.5, y=-4.5)

### Copper Cable Factory at Position (x=10.5, y=0.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling Machine at position (x=10.5, y=0.5)
- Inserter at position (x=7.5, y=5.5) and another at position (x=9.5, y=5.5)
- BeltGroup connecting the furnace to the assembling machine with belts at positions such as (x=10.5, y=4.5) to (x=10.5, y=6.5)
- Small Electric Poles at positions such as (x=10.5, y=-1.5), (x=11.5, y=-1.5), (x=12.5, y=0.5), etc.

### Iron Ore Mining Site at Position (x=-11.0, y=20.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (x=-11.0, y=20.0)
- Wooden Chest at position (x=-11.5, y=18.5)

### Copper Ore Mining Site at Position (x=20.0, y=20.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (x=20.0, y=20.0)
- Wooden Chest at position (x=19.5, y=18.5)

### Stone Furnace at Position (x=5.0, y=5.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (x=5.0, y=5.0)

### Miscellaneous
- Wooden Chest at position (x=-3.5, y=0.5) and another at position (x=-3.5, y=2.5)
- Inserter at position (x=-3.5, y=1.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when Using Inventory Items
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into another entity. For example, attempting to insert coal when there is none in the inventory will result in an error.

### Errors when Placing into a Tile Which is Occupied by Another Entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing. This will prevent placement errors due to occupied tiles.
